phrs.translation: 离开海底, 锚离底的, 离底, 刚离开水面的
起锚, 翠风艳曲, 保卫黄河, 翠凤艳曲
锚离底, 起锚进行曲

sentences.sentence: The anchor being aweigh, the anchor being lowered, under the guidance of the pilot, the ship sailed to berth.
sentences.translation: 锚离底， 降下锚球， 在引航员的指挥下驶往泊位，大副和木匠在船首了头。

sentences.sentence: The anchor being aweigh, the anchor being lowered, under the guidance of the pilot, the ship sailed to berth. The chief mate and carpenter outlooked on the bow. (logbook).
sentences.translation: 锚离底，降下锚球，在引航员的指挥下驶往泊位，大副和木匠在船首了头。(航海日志)。
